name: Google Gmail
description: Search, read, send, and manage Gmail messages via Google API
author: PalmClaw Team

tools.name: gmail_search
tools.description: Search Gmail messages using Gmail query syntax. Returns a list of matching emails with id, threadId, subject, from, date, and snippet. Example queries: 'from:user@example.com', 'subject:meeting', 'is:unread', 'newer_than:1d'.

query.description: Gmail search query (same syntax as Gmail search bar)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10, max: 50)

tools.name: gmail_get_message
tools.description: Get the full content of a specific Gmail message by its ID. Returns subject, from, to, cc, date, body (plain text), and attachments list.

tools.name: gmail_send
tools.description: Send a new email via Gmail. Supports plain text body. For HTML, set content_type to 'text/html'.

to.description: Recipient email address(es), comma-separated for multiple

tools.name: gmail_reply
tools.description: Reply to an existing email thread. The reply is sent in the same thread.

message_id.description: The message ID to reply to

tools.name: gmail_list_labels
tools.description: List all Gmail labels (folders) for the authenticated account.
